title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, July 6, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of painter Frida Kahlo (1907-1954), who said, “I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of painter Frida Kahlo (1907-1954), who said, “I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality.”
